title: Calibration certificates for instruments
dataVerified: Technician name, lab certification number, instrument ID, calibration date, next calibration due date, calibration standards used
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Certificate format suitable for scientific and medical equipment verification. Regulatory compliance for FDA, ISO, and industry standards. Domain binding verifies legitimate calibration laboratory. Critical for regulated industries where equipment calibration records must be verified during audits. Prevents fake calibration certificates.
